Cocokind Turmeric Spot Treatment  Collective

Brand: Cocokind

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: ORGANIC HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER SEED) OIL, ORGANIC CERA FLAVA (BEESWAX), ORGANIC CURCUMA LONGA (TURMERIC ROOT) POWDER, ORGANIC ZINGIBER OFFICINALE (GINGER ROOT) POWDER, ORGANIC MELALEUCA ALTERNIFOLIA (TEA TREE) LEAF OIL
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
